name: Portl
overview:
The best of the web at the tip of your fingers.

Portl is a mobile-first search engine that you tune like a TV. For any topic you want, Portl builds a custom channel with videos, Tweets, pictures, Wikipedia pages, and more. Anything you see is easily saved, shared and discussed with friends. Portl makes search entertaining.

“If Google started from scratch, this is what they’d build.” - early tester

  • Portl is a meta-search & discovery client-server system capable of dynamically synthesizing a channel of videos, Tweets, pictures, audio, Wikipedia pages, and other content for any subject.

Portl is aware of what topics are trending globally, locally, in a given topic ‘sphere’ (like professional tennis), or in interest areas. This allows us to present what is essentially a search interface that is pre-populated with a bunch of relevant topics, while not impeding custom search. Portl delivers whether with with a clear intent to search or just to browse what’s up right now.
